description: You are looking for a "Action Role Playing Game" ?Well, Heretic Gods is simply the best game for Android if you are ravenous for Epic Loot, mastering skills and to butcher through hordes of monsters in dark dungeons.Heretic Gods is an ARPG in which players can enter a dark world, full of dungeons and monsters, set in the land of the Viking Myths. Your objective will be to enter the depths of a cursed abbey to banish the heretical gods.The control system of Heretic Gods is intuitive and is very well adapted to tactile devices. With the virtual crossbar on the left of the screen you can move your character, while with the buttons on the right you can attack and use skills. With just pressing the attack buttons, your hero will automatically target the nearest enemy.The dungeons of Heretic Gods are generated randomly, so you will never play twice in the same scenario. That said, many levels are very similar to each other, with different variations in architecture and especially in the variation of enemies. The more levels you raise, the deeper you dive into new dungeons with stronger enemies to fight.A very important aspect of Heretic Gods is the loot. You can find and equip hundreds and hundreds of different objects, including axes, helmets, gloves, boots, armor, shields, bows, swords, rings, and so on. In the village, in addition, we can trade with its inhabitants or even craft your own items.Heretic Gods manages to successfully adapt the formula of popular roleplaying games to tactile devices. For this, it not only offers an accessible control system, but also some levels with a relatively short duration, which we can finish in a few minutes perfectly styled for mobile gaming.‚Ä¢ random generated dungeons‚Ä¢ shape up different character-builds out of 48+ skills‚Ä¢ adjustable graphic settings for best performance even on old hardware‚Ä¢ innovative auto targeting system‚Ä¢ optional auto fight system‚Ä¢ infinite random generated magic items‚Ä¢ hundreds of unique items and set items‚Ä¢ fully playable for free‚Ä¢ 3 difficulties‚Ä¢ ongoing updates for even more game-contentHereticGods grants full playability now and will be upgraded through updates.future updates will include more:‚Ä¢ unique items‚Ä¢ set items‚Ä¢ enemies‚Ä¢ boss enemies‚Ä¢ quests‚Ä¢ skills‚Ä¢ game environments
descriptionHTML:
You are looking for a "Action Role Playing Game" ?
Well, Heretic Gods is simply the best game for Android if you are ravenous for Epic Loot, mastering skills and to butcher through hordes of monsters in dark dungeons.

Heretic Gods is an ARPG in which players can enter a dark world, full of dungeons and monsters, set in the land of the Viking Myths. Your objective will be to enter the depths of a cursed abbey to banish the heretical gods.

The control system of Heretic Gods is intuitive and is very well adapted to tactile devices. With the virtual crossbar on the left of the screen you can move your character, while with the buttons on the right you can attack and use skills. With just pressing the attack buttons, your hero will automatically target the nearest enemy.

The dungeons of Heretic Gods are generated randomly, so you will never play twice in the same scenario. That said, many levels are very similar to each other, with different variations in architecture and especially in the variation of enemies. The more levels you raise, the deeper you dive into new dungeons with stronger enemies to fight.

A very important aspect of Heretic Gods is the loot. You can find and equip hundreds and hundreds of different objects, including axes, helmets, gloves, boots, armor, shields, bows, swords, rings, and so on. In the village, in addition, we can trade with its inhabitants or even craft your own items.

Heretic Gods manages to successfully adapt the formula of popular roleplaying games to tactile devices. For this, it not only offers an accessible control system, but also some levels with a relatively short duration, which we can finish in a few minutes perfectly styled for mobile gaming.

• random generated dungeons
• shape up different character-builds out of 48+ skills
• adjustable graphic settings for best performance even on old hardware
• innovative auto targeting system
• optional auto fight system
• infinite random generated magic items
• hundreds of unique items and set items
• fully playable for free
• 3 difficulties
• ongoing updates for even more game-content

HereticGods grants full playability now and will be upgraded through updates.
future updates will include more:
• unique items
• set items
• enemies
• boss enemies
• quests
• skills
• game environments
recentChanges: Update v.1.07.22 - HOTFIX (cant continue after stage 1 for new players)
- continue same dungeon after death (loot saved)
- final balancing on crusader skill-tree (skillpoint reset for all)
summary: Classic action dungeon crawler with arcade hack and slash feeling
title: HERETIC GODS

comments: This is exactly what I wanted from the start with Tin Man Games' books.  Only bad part is that I can't import old purchases, but that isn't their fault.
Stuck on logo screen with loading cog endlessly rotating.

Fantastic to have an app which collects all the individually released gamebooks into one library (shame that readers who have already purchased the individual gamebooks as individual apps can't get a code for a further discount though... Tin Man Games really should consider loyal customers in this light). If you've played the individual gamebook apps then you know what to expect - a faithful adaptation of the frontrunner in the CYOA market. Nostalgia-fest through and through. Just bought ALL the books currently available to purchase within the app - come on Tin Man Games, take my money and give me all the other books!!!

Kinda missing the opening cinematics from the individual gamebook apps, they set the mood nicely. Other than that, it's great to have all the books available in the one app especially when more of the old classics get released.
Why would I buy these books again?
description: Ready your sword, pack your provisions and prepare to embark upon quests of epic proportions! Journey a magical realm, fighting monsters and unravelling mysteries in Fighting Fantasy Classics: text-based roleplaying adventures remastered. Originally presented by Steve Jackson & Ian Livingstone in the 80s and 90s, Fighting Fantasy Classics brings these timeless tales to your phone or tablet, complete with 3D dice-rolling, Adventure and Encounter Sheets, atmospheric fantasy music and more!Play through classic adventures including:‚òÜ The Citadel of Chaos‚òÜ The Warlock of Firetop Mountain‚òÜ City of Thieves‚òÜ The Forest of Doom ‚òÜ Caverns of the Snow Witch ‚òÜ Island of the Lizard King‚òÜ BloodbonesWith more titles to come in future updates. Traverse the realm of Allansia, using your might and magic to hunt down evil demisorcers. Brave the dangers of Darkwood Forest to help save a doomed village of dwarves. Seek vengeance from the Pirate Lord who stole your family and destroyed your life many moons ago. Save a port-town from the wrath of an undead lord and his ghostly hound minions! Part story, part game, in these adventures YOU ARE THE HERO!
descriptionHTML:
Ready your sword, pack your provisions and prepare to embark upon quests of epic proportions! Journey a magical realm, fighting monsters and unravelling mysteries in Fighting Fantasy Classics: text-based roleplaying adventures remastered.

Originally presented by Steve Jackson & Ian Livingstone in the 80s and 90s, Fighting Fantasy Classics brings these timeless tales to your phone or tablet, complete with 3D dice-rolling, Adventure and Encounter Sheets, atmospheric fantasy music and more!

Play through classic adventures including:

☆ The Citadel of Chaos
☆ The Warlock of Firetop Mountain

With more titles to come in future updates.

Seek vengeance from the Pirate Lord who stole your family and destroyed your life many moons ago. Save a port-town from the wrath of an undead lord and his ghostly hound minions!

Part story, part game, in these adventures YOU ARE THE HERO!

comments: Alright, once you start the game, you will be bombarded with text, and difficult to read names if you are unfamiliar with the franchise, But you definitely get used to the UI and various names soon.   It is free to play, and unless you are aiming to be top 1% I personally don't think the cash shop is mandatory. You do get free stuffs in forms of daily chests and log in events, jut be patient if you don't want to spend money on it. You will get the stuffs eventually.    Story mode is fun, and often quite challenging, If you can't decide whether or not you want to play the game, just give it a try for few hours. Who knows, you might like it!

The worst thing happened in this game is players can use cheat/mod for annihilation. I low down from 5 star to 1 because of this issue which cannot be fixed in 3 weeks. There is no harsh punishment for cheating players who claim to the top to get reward. Even though I love this game so much, i am very disappointed with the response of developer of the game about this issue.

Edit: Crashes frequently as of last update.  Game is wonderful, just needs some content updates. Looking forward to Liu Bei, Sun Jian, Sun Quan, Dong Zhuo, Yuan Shao, and Lu Bu stories if they exist.  The strongest thing you have going here is your story mode, that's rare for a mobile game, don't squander it.

I love this game why couldn't fire emblem heros be like this? It's basically rot3k game but free and pay to make it got faster. It's not too bad excet it takes years to get enough green dragon things to unlock new characters then you have to buy them with silver coins can get really expensive that's the worst part of it and I can't even find a way to get some green things over and over maybe the quest? You get like 4...bur hey I guess do them everyday you will have some anyways love the game just some slight improvement needed to be made please don't screw it up this is the first phone game I actually enjoy!

Pacing is a bit slow, and getting good artifacts is a gacha sink, but the core gameplay is presently the best tactical gaming on offer for mobile phones.  FFT is still the genre's high mark, but RotTK is a different breed, and best in class.

Was loving the game until I upgraded to Android 8.0 and it stopped working. I just click on it and nothing happens. Will rate higher after that is fixed. Edit: As of now it is fully working with Android 8.0

comments: I've been playing this game, since it came out. I love it the same as I did then to now. This game does allow f2p to challenger some p2p as well. Sure there is a point where there is a wall, but at least you know your one of the strongest. Plus it makes me want to climb that wall, and topple whales.

Maybe one of the best games that still let you play to win. You can get everything with enough patience and a little luck. If you do want to pay though, it's gonna be pretty expensive and the stuff you get does not really let you advance a lot (unless you actually spend A LOT of money).

+ Easy to play + Good story line + Also easy to get the items + I like the game mechanic  - Need more challenging on battle - Need table of hero type - Inventory items don't include the gear being use  Overall i like this game, very good. Also, more hero will make this game more good. And... adding charge chain attack will be awesome  Edit: After update my account was lost, please fix it

This game is great. It doesnt beat you over the head with paywalls, you could probably play f2p and still have a ton of fun. Graphics are good and mechanics are deep and satisfying. Only complaint is the reddit coommunity, but cant blame the devs for that.

Previous rating was üëçüëç. Now üëç.  Content drought at the end of the game with some very expensive in app purchases. End game is killing the same dragon or farming the same level over and over and over...there are daily tasks which are a chore. Hoping for quality of life improvements similar to what the reddit suggests.   I really like the art style.

Great game with the most responsive and generous developers.  The only thing bad about this game is the toxic gaming community.  Full of unjustifiable whiners who are so poor they need their freebies for EVERY event or else they have a hissy fit and threaten to quit game AND also cry koz of nerfs on their heroes and threaten to quit(but really don't). They also attack every person who does spend for the game (casual spender or whale) God-forbid the devs need to also earn for a living.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the new game in the genre "Climb up the mountain!"

If you are a brave fellow and ready to challenge yourself, then this game is for you! Sit behind the wheel of a tractor, trucks or SUV and conquer steep slopes and impassable jungle.

On your way there will be a variety of obstacles that need to be overcome, whether it be mountains of logs, wooden boxes or mud puddles! Remember that at your disposal is a winch, which will help to overcome particularly complex areas.

Do not forget that every tractor, truck or SUV can be pumped to facilitate and accelerate the passage of cards. And connoisseurs of beauty can repaint the car in any color of the rainbow!

Features:
🚗 Various vehicles- Tractors, off-road vehicles, trucks
🔧 The ability to improve each car
⛰️ Diverse and beautiful levels
👍 Cool 3D graphics

Climbing the mountain on an SUV is not an easy task, but very fun! Have fun all the time.

If you suddenly find mistakes in the game, then boldly write about it in the reviews, we'll fix it.

Have fun!
recentChanges: - Fixed a system of traction when pumping engine power
- Added the ability to disable music in the game

descriptionHTML:
Journey through a frozen tundra and search for hidden treasures.
Fight the enemies and beasts that stand in your way!
Survive the competition by building the ultimate team!
Recruit new hunters, assemble your team, and become a legendary captain!


▶Quick Action Like Never Before!
Launch attacks 10+ times per second with immediate response using your fingertips!
Relieve that deep-rooted stress through thrilling and invigorating excitement!


▶Faster Is Easier!
Faster taps, more attacks, and more wins.
Fire numerous attacks within seconds at ease. Tap away - as much as you want!


▶You Are Not Alone. It’s All about Team Play!
Build your own team of 4 unique characters!
The combat offense and defense, an explosive bomber, and a healer.


▶Cinematic Action Scenes to Capture Your Attention!
Funny at times, and rough at times - immerse yourself into lifelike animation!
Beyond simple introductory clips, we’ll take you on an adventure!


▶Crazy and Fun-Loving Characters!
Meet a girl obsessed with bombs, a forever-alone grandpa, a pair of bread-hungry girls, a loan shark gunman, and many more! Collect a variety of teammates to learn their unique backstories.



[Permission Information]
- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
- READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Request to read or write data in external storage to optimize internal storage occupancy.

[How to Withdraw Permissions]
- OS 6.0 and above : Settings > Apps > Select application > Permissions > Manage your app permissions
- OS below 6.0 : Unable to manage permissions, permissions are disabled by deleting the app

descriptionHTML:
AUGMENTED REALITY POOL

With AR, you can spawn a life sized table on any surface. The mode features realistic ball physics and stunning 3D graphics. AR mode is fully customizable using your custom table felt and decals.

THE PREMIER POOL EXPERIENCE.

We’ve taken classic 8 ball pool and given it a modern and sophisticated upgrade. Every detail has been passionately debated and carefully designed to present you with a game that is simple to learn, addictive to play, and incredible to look at.

BIG BETS. BIG WINS.

Face off against skilled 8 ball pool players from around the world. Win and gain access to exclusive high-stakes tables. Build up your cash and become the richest billiards player in the game.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS IN CLUBS.

Start a club with your most skilled friends. Fight your way to the top together, earn awesome prizes and become the KINGS OF POOL. Bragging rights guaranteed.

LEADERBOARD.

Be the best pool player. Gain ranks, show your skill, stay on top of the list!

PULL OFF TRICK SHOTS.

Show your magic 8 ball pots with our trick shot engine.

Other Highlights:

★ FREE ONLINE MULTIPLAYER POOL → challenge billiards players online, always free, forever.

★ PLAY LIKE A PRO → our advanced physics engine gives you the precision you need to hit that perfect shot every time.

comments: I have really enjoyed this game from the first week it dropped. Never spent a penny. Most things I can compete in. What players say about pay2play is true though.  If you want to play at the highest level you HAVE TO PAY! There is a very clear pay wall and everyone knows it. If your starting off and your free to play it will take you awhile and I don't even think it will be work it unless you plan to put at least 6 month in to be somewhat relevant.

Stop doing these tutorials that force you to select their options, if I need a tutorial I'll use the tutorial, if I want to just play the game and figure it out along the way let me do that.   I'm so sick of these games that don't give you any option. Is there anyone that likes tutorials that are done like this?

Pros: ‚Ä¢ Semi-Balanced pvp. ‚Ä¢ Tons of characters. ‚Ä¢ Fun leveling system. ‚Ä¢ Entertaining in-game events  ‚Ä¢ Challenging story mode. ‚Ä¢ No need to pay to become very strong.  ‚Ä¢ Auto-battles that save time.   Cons: ‚Ä¢ Constant Pop-ups reminding you to purchase loot boxes. ‚Ä¢ You will get wrecked by serious pay-to-wins. ‚Ä¢ Impossible drop rates for 5‚òÜ characters and Chaos/Order heros. ‚Ä¢ Paying to unlock 5‚òÜ heros that may or may not be 5‚òÜ. ‚Ä¢ The company spamming copy pasted messages to players who have beef with thier game instead of constructive replies.  Overall: Still a pretty cool game.

A game with buckets of potential, led astray by poor decisions & short term constant cash grabs(multiple times a week)  Poor balancing - stat accensions, Crown dust upgrade costs ( when even  avip 10+ lvl60 developer acc hadn't upgraded any crowns..I've checked dozens of high vip lvl 60s 0 upgraded crowns) 6* artis are pointless & don't feel worth owning.  Constant pop ups, easily 40-50 store pop ups per day sometimes multiple times within a minute.  the Lucky 7 quest was criminal, horrendous design & I won't be spending a penny with you guys again until I see you go down a better path.   the positives, autoing but being able to leave the game. Festival/ hero events are pretty damn good although it be nice to see different style events that 'have gameplay'  Characters are well designed & are extremely fun to use.   To summarise, has some excellent features but it's let down by some horrendous balancing & constant cash grabs that would get EA taking notes.
It's dank and my homies love to rekt fu's. Try and stay away from me.. tang tang
Alot of random crashs and when it crashs it changes my wallpaper on my tablet...ptp store WAY over priced

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Alliance: Heroes of the Spire, the latest action-packed RPG! Collect powerful Heroes and create the perfect superhero team. Gather your Alliance to challenge fearsome enemies, develop cunning strategies, and clash with other players to prove your strength!

Alliance: Heroes of the Spire is available in 7 languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese and Russian.

Meet players on our official forums: alliance-community.rumblegames.com/forums
Like us on Facebook: facebook.com/alliancegame
Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/Alliance_HOTS


Collect and Upgrade:
● Over 400 unique Heroes available to build your ultimate team
● Craft Heroes to continue expanding your collection
● Ascend your Heroes to unlock strong new Skills
● Skill Up your Heroes to make them more potent in combat
● Choose from 19 unique Equipment sets which provide bonuses to your Heroes
● Combine Equipment sets for epic bonuses
● Socket Jewels to make your Equipment even more powerful


Fight!
● Continue your battles when you are away from the game with Offline Battle Mode!
● Face off against the elements of Fire, Water, Nature, Order, Chaos, and Shadow
● Optimize team strategy based on Hero Skill synergies
● Explore countless Rifts and claim their treasure
● Defeat mythical boss encounters for legendary rewards
● Conquer other players in the Arena and Tournament


Hero Events:
● Fight Heroes from many worlds for a chance to secure their allegiance and summon them to your Barracks
● Progress through Hero Event Rifts to try your hand at obtaining the most powerful Heroes in all of Fracture
● New Heroes released each month!


Alliance War:
● Battle against two other Alliances to seize control of territory
● Hold your position on the battlefield to earn Banners for your Alliance and secure victory
● Earn rewards for your entire Alliance - the higher you place, the better the spoils of war!
● Climb through the ranks to fight against the toughest Alliances in Fracture


Co-op Dungeons:
● Grab an Alliancemate and take down the strongest bosses in Fracture together
● Challenge yourself to conquer higher floors of the Co-op Dungeon for better rewards!
● Equip your Heroes with Crowns and Crown Jewels to boost their strength further


Social:
● Join an Alliance, or create one of your own
● Level up your Alliance to unlock additional benefits for all members
● Share your latest strategies and Hero builds with other players
● Challenge Alliancemates and friends to PvP duels
● Make new friends across all of Fracture!

1875 South Grant Street, Suite 110
San Mateo, CA 94402

description: ‚ò†Ô∏è   In this dynamic and frightening thriller, you have to investigate the mysterious things happening in your neighbor's house.  Beware! What you can find in the basement of his home can be too frightening. Your neighbor is a dangerous person and does not tolerate incursions, so beware of him! Avoid all the traps and video cameras with which his home is crammed, and find out what terrible things he does there!‚ò† Ô∏è The gameplay is an interactive quest, where you yourself will be the main character!  The camera with a first-person view perfectly conveys the atmosphere, so the game will be very realistic. The plot at first seems uncomplicated - you just moved into a new house and now want to meet a new neighbors from the house opposite. However, this is not so easy. The neighbor turns out to be a closed and unsociable person, whose house is always locked in a dozen castles. To that the yard of his house is completely covered with traps, video cameras and other traps. Strong sounds, like the screams of horror coming from his home from time to time, also frighten him terribly. To top it off, you often notice how a neighbor game digs some pits in his yard. Obviously, something mysterious and terrible is happening. Your task is to overcome your fear and figure out what's wrong!‚ò†Ô∏è  You have to sneak into the house of a terrible neighbor, bypassing all of its traps and surveillance cameras.  But not just cameras need to be afraid! The neighbor himself is a dangerous person, and he certainly will not tolerate an invasion of his home. Act as secretly as possible and remain unnoticed - otherwise you will not be able to leave the neighbor's house alive!Get to the truth and do not let the neighbor commit new evil deeds!
descriptionHTML:
☠️ In this dynamic and frightening thriller, you have to investigate the mysterious things happening in your neighbor's house. Beware! What you can find in the basement of his home can be too frightening. Your neighbor is a dangerous person and does not tolerate incursions, so beware of him! Avoid all the traps and video cameras with which his home is crammed, and find out what terrible things he does there!

☠ ️ The gameplay is an interactive quest, where you yourself will be the main character! The camera with a first-person view perfectly conveys the atmosphere, so the game will be very realistic. The plot at first seems uncomplicated - you just moved into a new house and now want to meet a new neighbors from the house opposite. However, this is not so easy. The neighbor turns out to be a closed and unsociable person, whose house is always locked in a dozen castles. To that the yard of his house is completely covered with traps, video cameras and other traps. Strong sounds, like the screams of horror coming from his home from time to time, also frighten him terribly. To top it off, you often notice how a neighbor game digs some pits in his yard. Obviously, something mysterious and terrible is happening. Your task is to overcome your fear and figure out what's wrong!

☠️ You have to sneak into the house of a terrible neighbor, bypassing all of its traps and surveillance cameras. But not just cameras need to be afraid! The neighbor himself is a dangerous person, and he certainly will not tolerate an invasion of his home. Act as secretly as possible and remain unnoticed - otherwise you will not be able to leave the neighbor's house alive!


Get to the truth and do not let the neighbor commit new evil deeds!
summary: Watch your awful neighbor and uncover his secret!
title: Demonic Neighbor

comments: Best game I've played on mobile so far. Super cute graphics, nice sound effects, so many different heroes, monsters and shops all with unique designs.  Only two improvements I would make. 1) a pay option to remove the ads (I would definitely pay that). 2) an option to tap an evo to get a list of stages that give the most creatures that give that evo, so you don't have to search through all the stages to find them.

This is by far the best 3 match game for me  :) Keep up the good work. I wish you have themed or event part for grinding more evo or money but still, without it, it is already addicting. I always stay away to play at least 5-6h to regenerate energy. Kudos for a very intricate game to made but easy to play :)

Only been playing for a few days now but so far I like it. Cute simple graphics, easy to play, fun little characters.. Challenging enough to keep it interesting. The only downfall is the energy.. Never did like the per-level energy drain, if you're passing levels then it shouldn't cost you. When or if I play longer I will leave a more positive review, but so far it's a 4 star game for me.

This game is really well put together and worth a try, but for me the short time limits placed on each move in battle cause a tension which just leaves me feeling stressed. I don't have enough time to really think about what I'm doing. That's my subjective experience however, and I'd still recommend you try it out.

One of the best matching battlers I've played in a long time. Everything feels really nice. The art style is great and the gem interactions are satisfying. Despite monetizing earlier in the game, I feel that I've hit a pretty solid wall and the difficulty curve is too aggressive. I'll keep chipping away at it but it's become a bit frustrating.

The game starts out just fine. Bright colors, nice pixel art and a catchy chiptune soundtrack. You get caught up in upgrading shops and heroes too. But it gets very redundant very fast. Opening the highest level chest feels less rewarding than it should, getting multiple repeat heroes gets disheartening and no change in soundtrack gets annoying. I'd rather have the arena theme replace the boss theme honestly. It definitely provides a good diversion but I think I'm still playing it out of completionism than legitimate fun.

comments: This app is great. A person doesn't have to pay money to play. Players get 5 seconds to answer the question. I haven't won yet, but I'm having fun playing.

Ive won 3 tournaments and so far the app is legit. It paid me 4 days later to my Paypal account. Can't wait to get my next Payout and my deal dash gift card. I've already recommend it to 4 people. Best trivia app out. The only reason it's not 5 stars is because it's frozen on me in the middle of contests and I lose all lives. It's frozen 4 or five times since updating it.

So occasionally the app won't even allow you to answer a question and then says "you didn't answer". This has cost me lives and to be eliminated from tournaments. If this would stop happening I will gladly give more stars.
Thought it was a scam, but I was wrong. Fairly new site and they are working things out, got paid for PayPal wins. Fun and addicting. Also great communication from their support team.
It is a legit game. I have physically won 3 times in less than a week. There are minor freezes, but the app is new in development!
It is a good game but you got to sort out the bugs, I've been frozen on certain games resulting in me being kicked out. Thats not fair, sort it please.

descriptionHTML:
Join your Facebook friends & millions of other pirates from the 7 seas in the best pirates game: PIRATE KINGS! Build your land and make it the paradise island that a pirate of your quality deserves!

Millions of pirates & islanders play Pirate Kings every day – Spin away!

Sail to adventure!
Ship away to fun pirate adventures! Play multiplayer games at Pirate Kings and prove you are a true freebooter. Shoot cannonballs to attack rival pirate islands, protect yourself from other pirates’ strikes and mine gold in this pirates adventure game.

Spin the wheel & win prize
There is only one thing a pirate loves more than the islands and seas: gold! Spin the pirates wheel and win free coins - a true pirate can never have enough cash! Even more, if you are truly lucky, shoot cannonballs and attack other pirates’ islands and loot their forbidden treasures and cash. Yo ho ho and a bottle of rum!

Build & grow your islands
Once you’ve gathered enough cash and own a proper island, enjoy the building game experience in this pirate adventure or explore additional islands! Build castles, put up a statue, decorate, and grow your ship as you play this multiplayer game with friends or random people! Pirate, your island is not a game, it is your paradise, let it grow!

Join your mateys!
Your Facebook friends are waiting online to match your pirates’ battle skills – come on board and join your fellow islanders! Spin the wheel and play a game with your Facebook friends or random players around the world, loot their treasure, attack and steal their gold or defend your treasure from their attacks. Pirates love to be competitive!

Additional Mighty Features:
★ Battle your friends – shoot cannonballs and attack, loot and steal gold, defend your island!
★ Spin the daily bonus every day & get FREE BONUS COINS
★ Revenge - Attack other pirates who have looted your precious treasure
★ Play with friends!
★ Use your gold to level up and build dozens of new islands

Become the Pirate King now! It's free-to-play, but you can purchase additional in-game items with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
Any suggestions or new ideas? Experiencing any problems? We love our players! You can reach our support from inside the game!
Pirate, your islands and friends await!

Follow us on Instagram: http://bit.ly/PKInsta

descriptionHTML:
happy wheels is a fun and free game is fairly easy to understand and play.
happy wheels is an obstacle rag-doll extreme sports game, your goals is to reach the finish line, you will encounter various obstacles that can damage your character.

This happy whesls is a fun action-packed real-time racing simulation game in Happy Wheels 2!
When you feel bored with your office work, just sit at a table full of hanging paper. Why not roll down the hill under the blue sky with a bike race game flipped on a bike wheel? Drive your bike on a very happy adventure racing under the hot skies.

This happy wheels game is a rag-doll extreme csr sports game. Experience the real physics based racing game on your phone, happy wheels offers an exhilarating mix of amazing tracks, a little happy wheels 3 of fortune and deadly challenges. Feel the dash speed as you negotiate your way through the deadly survival courses. Perform death defying wild stunts, witness bone cracking impacts and lose a limb or few, and take it to the extreme!

Welcome to Happy Wheels - a very happy flipping race simulator fighting game. You will be the master driver driving your passion for hot racing. Your task is to tap the screen to rush and roll volcanoes, fly into the river under the fire, shine on the sky, and then up. Finish Sometimes you just run like an epic master, just dive in a knife to die. Keep in your mind, drive ahead, do not come back, just shoot the sausage, hurry ahead and forward, wait wait, the millionaire spin to fight the real swing. Sausage bike fight If just a little dumb mistake, or you are not a fortune-teller, many ways to die, your flip bike will be destroyed as the paper tear of the paper by engagement.

Experience the feeling rolling down the hill under the blue skies with the wonderful bike race. Drive rolling, run forward, flippy hills, hurry across mountains, paper flowers are falling in the streets. Or just like a master driver, drive an epic bike, flip it over, race a fire and dive in a way that will not die. Rolling down the hill under the hot sky in your freedom bay is a hot runner, your legs tired just one way is to drive ahead and a little fortune, but there are many flip flops to Roll up the mountain to climb, the river to cross, and many ways to die very hard, but very happy.

Experience the feeling of rolling down the hill under blue sky with bike race is wonderful, drive rolling ahead the hill, dash crossing the mountain, paper flower is falling in the road. Or just like a dumb guy drive the csr bike to the dumb racing and find the ways not to die. Rolling down a hill under the hot sky,your wheel is hot , your legs so tired, just one way is drive ahead and a little fortune, but there are many hill to rolling, mountain to climb, river to cross and.. many ways to die.
Welcome to happy wheels A very happy csr bike race game. You will be a racing biker drive your wheel in the hot racing , your task is tap screen to dash and rolling down the hill, crossing the river, under shining sky and then go finished . Sometime you run like a dumb guy, just find the ways to die. Keep in your mind alway drive ahead, no return, it just dash ahead and ahead , waiting for a little fortune.. If just a small dumb mistake or you’re not a fortune man, many ways to die, your csr bike will be destroyed as a torn piece of paper by the death race.
Tap the forward button to dash, tap turn left or turn right button to rotate your wheel in the air . When encountering obstacles tap stop button to decrease the speed. All you need is timing to tap the buttons and a little fortune.

happy wheels is a rag-doll physics Arcade & extreme sports Racing game in which you can jump off buildings, crush the glass & avoid obstacles & spikes and arrow

comments: Really need to address the lag time between scenes. Also the puzzles and mini games are way too easy. Stop giving away all the answers and doing tasks for the player. Don't  need any fights as challenges. If I wanted some I would download a game of them. Whatever happened to using your brain to figure things out. These type of games were much more fun back then. All in all I liked the game but as a whole the adventure games seem to be regressing mentally. By the way, a very nice length game finally and worth the sale price of $2.99.

Pretty good game! Lovely graphics, interactive hops, lots of mini-games, some pretty challenging. Good length for sale price plus a super long bonus game!  Extras include 26 souvenirs to find and any collectibles you may have missed. For me, the only negative is inability to zoom.

I liked this game. There is a credible storyline and brilliant graphics. The mini games were different and not too challenging. They are all doable, even the one with the anchors and red ball (eventually)  The only way I completed the knight one Pam was by following the picture in the strategy guide very carefully and a lot of trial and error. It did take ages even then but it's a really good feeling when you get it! It feels like cheating when I use the guide for the games but on this occasion it was necessary! Well worth the sale price.

It's pretty good... My only complaint is that is hard to pick up & use the items in the inventory. I had to grab items multiple times to pick it up. I like the tap & use much better than dragging to use. Other than that is a good game. Haven't decided if I'll buy full version yet.

üòü It is slow and jerky, with the sound cutting in and out. Touch controls are sluggish. I have to tap area times to get what I want and where I want. Overall I found it work to get the responses I was aiming for, the objects I wanted, and get to where I wanted. Some of the minigames were difficult to respond to my touches and I ended skipping the last one on the free portion. This is why I did not purchase the game and did not go past the free trial portion of the game. Based on what I played, I'd give it a 3.0 only. I tried it nearly 2 months later, and no change. The sound variations from blaring loud to nearly silent in frequent, nearly continuously during the game, is so annoying that I couldn't stand to play it long, and makes the gaming experience very unpleasant. Very disappointing, especially for a Big Fish game! üò•

It's ok. Good value since on sale and a long game so got an extra star.  Map didn't always transport and not the best map I've seen by far, load time long, story so-so, sometimes had to try right move several times to get it to work. You can go back for collectibles missed. There's fire symbol with an icon to show collected and animal tile pieces with no icon. Morphing objects in hidden objects with icon. Several new minis of varying levels. I had problems understanding how to play some but that might just be me.

description: Neighbors can sometimes create problems more seriously than noise at the wrong time of the day. In this game you have to face exactly with such an unusual, whose home is fraught with ice-cold things. Get into his house unnoticed, bypassing all the traps and video cameras, and get to the truth!The main character in this interactive thriller is yourself, thanks to a realistic camera from the first person. Moving to a new home, you discover some oddities in the behavior of your neighbors from the house opposite. From his home regularly sound some strange sounds, like cries. And one dark night a neighbor drags out of his house a bag with something that terribly reminiscent of the human body. It becomes clear that something terrible is happening. You can not stay away-you need to get into the neighbor game house and find out what's going on! However, this will not be so easy! Every corner of his yard is adorned with a mobile video camera, and on the ground there are sharp traps everywhere. And the neighbor himself, apparently, is a pretty dangerous person. Stay unnoticed and uncover a terrible secret!Features:üö™ Advanced camera system from the first person, allowing you to move around freely and look without any delay!üö™ Finding and using useful items. Find a flashlight, pickpockets, keys, smoke bombs and the like - all this will be very useful to you in the house!üö™ Constantly look at both - a neighbor can lie in wait for you anywhere!üö™ In a critical situation, you can try to escape and take shelter in your own home - there the neighbor will not be able to get through!üö™ Your goal is the basement of the neighbor's house. It is there that lies the key to unraveling all the terrible secrets!üö™ A stunning soundtrack, the sinister melodies of which perfectly convey the atmosphere of a mystical thriller!
descriptionHTML:
Neighbors can sometimes create problems more seriously than noise at the wrong time of the day. In this game you have to face exactly with such an unusual, whose home is fraught with ice-cold things. Get into his house unnoticed, bypassing all the traps and video cameras, and get to the truth!


The main character in this interactive thriller is yourself, thanks to a realistic camera from the first person. Moving to a new home, you discover some oddities in the behavior of your neighbors from the house opposite. From his home regularly sound some strange sounds, like cries. And one dark night a neighbor drags out of his house a bag with something that terribly reminiscent of the human body. It becomes clear that something terrible is happening. You can not stay away-you need to get into the neighbor game house and find out what's going on! However, this will not be so easy! Every corner of his yard is adorned with a mobile video camera, and on the ground there are sharp traps everywhere. And the neighbor himself, apparently, is a pretty dangerous person. Stay unnoticed and uncover a terrible secret!


Features:


🚪 Advanced camera system from the first person, allowing you to move around freely and look without any delay!

🚪 Finding and using useful items. Find a flashlight, pickpockets, keys, smoke bombs and the like - all this will be very useful to you in the house!

🚪 Constantly look at both - a neighbor can lie in wait for you anywhere!

🚪 In a critical situation, you can try to escape and take shelter in your own home - there the neighbor will not be able to get through!

🚪 Your goal is the basement of the neighbor's house. It is there that lies the key to unraveling all the terrible secrets!

🚪 A stunning soundtrack, the sinister melodies of which perfectly convey the atmosphere of a mystical thriller!

- the neighbor began to move faster at night
summary: Uncover the terrible secret lurking in the basement of your neighbor!
title: Neighbor from Nightmare

descriptionHTML:
Word Chef is a new type of the classic word search, scrabble word finder puzzle game. In this game, you are the chef, your duty is to find the right formulas to make great disks.
There are many types of disks such as: ice cream, cake, seafood, salad, national disk, drinks. So challenge yourself and become the master chef ever.

How to play:
- Swipe to connect letters and build a valid word.
- Fill out all the letter boxes with words.

When you get stuck at a difficult level:
- Use "Shuffle" function to shuffle letters, then perhaps you find it easier to recognize the valid word.
- Use "Hint" function to open a letter in letter box.
- Take screenshot and ask your friends. You can also share the game with your friends then you and them can play this fantastic game together.

We take pride in saying that Word Chef Search Puzzles is the best word search game for Android. The themes are what makes this app interesting, instead of auto generated word search levels. You can spend countless hours finding words! It's perfect with your daily cup of coffee.

Game feature:

• Beautiful HD graphics
• Beautiful Background
• Sweet animations
• Many challenging levels
• Easy & fun to play, challenging to master

description: In the middle of the blue sea underwater, lies a world which humans are not aware of, in that world a whole life lives, breathes just as the life above water!! Just as that, the life is not only of creatures called fish but of underwater humans called mermaids!! These mermaids eat, live, survive just as humans do and their life system is equally similar!!! They sleep when it‚Äôs dark and wake up at dawn. They fall in love and they live a life of their own! Similarly, if they can do all that they can also get pregnant!!! This game is based on a secret story of a mermaid who witnessed the cruelty of the human world while she was pregnant with a baby!! Just like humans catch fish in their nasty nets every year this time the pregnant mermaid mommy who was showing the world to her expecting baby gets trapped in the human net!!!You must be feeling for the mermaid mom, just like you so did one of the sea merchants!!! When he saw that their nasty net caught an innocent mermaid who was pregnant and in labor pain he immediately reaches out for the mermaid mom and lets her go back to the see because she needed and emergency surgery!!!Thankful to the human the pregnant mermaid rushes back underwater to the mermaid baby hospital to complete her baby story!!! Since the mermaid has been rescued once, she has to be rescued again by you who is the best doctor and gynecologist in the world underwater!!Now is the time to save the mommy in the mermaid rescue operation game!!! Rest her in your hospital and take utmost care of her!!! The mermaid rescue pregnancy operation is quite similar to human pregnant surgery only in terms of cesarean operation!! So, you have to perform the cesarean surgery on the pregnant mommy!!!  The game starts off with giving the pregnant mermaid mom some good time to sleep so she is active before the surgery!!! Then we have to give her some good and required food a pregnant woman should eat!!! After that check if her blood pressure, temperature and sugar levels are alright!! Followed by an oxygen mask to give her good space to breathe before the operation!! After that give her a good anesthesia injection which will create a perfect numbing affect so that it doesn‚Äôt cause pain to the mommy during her operation!!  Next you mark a very careful cesarean cut on her stomach to get the mermaid baby out!! And congratulations you are successful in mermaid rescue for the newborn surgery!!!HOW TO PLAY SAVE MOM MERMAID RESCUE BABY NEWBORN SURGERY:‚Ä¢	Start the game ‚Ä¢	Select the scene ‚Ä¢	Start the mom care process as guided by the game ‚Ä¢	Using the hand indicators play the game for ease‚Ä¢	Perform the entire surgery as guided:-	Take tests-	Take ultrasound-	Give injection -	Cut for baby -	Stitch after baby is out -	Sooth the stomach‚Ä¢	Proceed with the further game play FEATURES OF SAVE MOM MERMAID RESCUE BABY NEWBORN SURGERY:‚Ä¢	Surgery simulation ‚Ä¢	Surgical instruments ‚Ä¢	Attractive graphics for kids ‚Ä¢	Multiple levels ‚Ä¢	Engaging game play
descriptionHTML:
In the middle of the blue sea underwater, lies a world which humans are not aware of, in that world a whole life lives, breathes just as the life above water!! Just as that, the life is not only of creatures called fish but of underwater humans called mermaids!!

These mermaids eat, live, survive just as humans do and their life system is equally similar!!! They sleep when it’s dark and wake up at dawn. They fall in love and they live a life of their own! Similarly, if they can do all that they can also get pregnant!!!

This game is based on a secret story of a mermaid who witnessed the cruelty of the human world while she was pregnant with a baby!! Just like humans catch fish in their nasty nets every year this time the pregnant mermaid mommy who was showing the world to her expecting baby gets trapped in the human net!!!

You must be feeling for the mermaid mom, just like you so did one of the sea merchants!!! When he saw that their nasty net caught an innocent mermaid who was pregnant and in labor pain he immediately reaches out for the mermaid mom and lets her go back to the see because she needed and emergency surgery!!!

Thankful to the human the pregnant mermaid rushes back underwater to the mermaid baby hospital to complete her baby story!!! Since the mermaid has been rescued once, she has to be rescued again by you who is the best doctor and gynecologist in the world underwater!!

Now is the time to save the mommy in the mermaid rescue operation game!!! Rest her in your hospital and take utmost care of her!!! The mermaid rescue pregnancy operation is quite similar to human pregnant surgery only in terms of cesarean operation!!
So, you have to perform the cesarean surgery on the pregnant mommy!!!

The game starts off with giving the pregnant mermaid mom some good time to sleep so she is active before the surgery!!! Then we have to give her some good and required food a pregnant woman should eat!!!

After that check if her blood pressure, temperature and sugar levels are alright!! Followed by an oxygen mask to give her good space to breathe before the operation!!
After that give her a good anesthesia injection which will create a perfect numbing affect so that it doesn’t cause pain to the mommy during her operation!!

Next you mark a very careful cesarean cut on her stomach to get the mermaid baby out!! And congratulations you are successful in mermaid rescue for the newborn surgery!!!

HOW TO PLAY SAVE MOM MERMAID RESCUE BABY NEWBORN SURGERY:
• Start the game
• Select the scene
• Start the mom care process as guided by the game
• Using the hand indicators play the game for ease
• Perform the entire surgery as guided:
- Take tests
- Take ultrasound
- Give injection
- Cut for baby
- Stitch after baby is out
- Sooth the stomach
• Proceed with the further game play

FEATURES OF SAVE MOM MERMAID RESCUE BABY NEWBORN SURGERY:
• Surgery simulation
• Surgical instruments
• Attractive graphics for kids
• Multiple levels
• Engaging game play
summary: Save pregnant mom on sea shore in mermaid rescue newborn surgery operation game!
title: Save Mom Mermaid Rescue Baby Newborn Surgery

descriptionHTML:
Flat Human FreeFall is an unrivaled game in which you will be in the role of a strange and funny little man to pass the most difficult levels. In the game there are no restrictions and there is no script written, it all depends on you!

The world of Flat Human FreeFall is completely at your disposal! Very interesting and unusual game. In this game you just have not played.

Pass the levels in many ways and you will understand how unpredictable this world is!

Use Bonuses or Boosters to make your journey easier and not have to start over.

Bonus Slow motion - slows down time and gives you the opportunity to react to the changing world.
Bonus Jump - speed up the character for a moment, save your life at the right time.
Bonus Life - cools the time back, resurrects the protagonist and returns a few seconds before his death!

Your character can interact with all obstacles and objects in the game, as well as drop from a variety of ledges. There is a standard physics for our world, so be careful in your fall!

Play with your friends in the role of strange crazy little men, beat each other's records!

- Fascinating gameplay.
- Cool music.

descriptionHTML:
Your friends – fluffy kitten Kiki and adorable puppy Fifi – are inviting you to their new adventures at Royal Pet Hotel. Have fun while exploring the hotel and taking care of your virtual animal guests!

There is no time to be bored! Decorate Pet Hotel and design the most amazing reception desk. Help puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room. Unpack Fifi’s clothes, shoes and accessories, and style her bag. Don’t forget to feed Fifi when she is hungry! You can find her favorite dishes at the Hotel Café: pizza, doughnuts and juice cocktails!

Play pet style makeover in Kiki’s room, and create the perfect hair and makeup look. Take care of baby tiger Lili while she is taking a bath. Shop for stylish clothes and accessories for all animal friends, and feel free to ask cute fluffy hotel staff for help!

Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel fun little games for kids:
· Style and decorate Reception to your own taste!
· Help little puppy Fifi to check-in and find her room!
· Unpack Fifi’s clothes and design her travel bag!
· Dry and comb Kiki’s beautiful hair and do her makeup!
· Help tiger Cara to take care of her baby Lili: bath her and style her hair!
· Feed Fifi yummy lunch at the Café!
· Dress up Kiki, Fifi, Cara and Lili in the most amazing outfits at the Fashion Shop!
· Call Reception if you have troubles – cute bunnies are ready to help you!
· Play Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel game every day and collect rewards!
· Watch videos and get extra coins for new game items!


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

ABOUT TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games cherish the childhood and help children learn the basic life skills through the games they love. Dress up games can develop creativity and art skills, cleanup games build good every day habits, cooking games show how to help parents at home, pet games teach to share and care. These are just a few examples how TutoTOONS games let children explore the world around them and develop on their screen time.

IMPORTANT message to parents
This app is free to play but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

DISCOVER more fun with TutoTOONS!

description: Lead your brigade of heroes to a war against Tetracorp corporation in the best shooting game. Build your frontline strategy in the battlefield and kill your enemy from all sides. Face limitless ops action in the online tournaments game mode.Take your weapons from a killing arsenal and level up your soldiers with unique shooter skills. Do you accept the challenge? TRY THE NEW ZOMBIE EVENT! KILL THE UNDEAD AND BE A HERO!COVER FIRE FEATURES- The New Shooter experience. Join the resistance and Command this revolution like a real war hero. Take your weapon, strike the enemy army with a hail of bullet, grenades, massive guns. Release the Fury of this War and be the best sniper and shooter in the arena! - Modern CONTROL that bring you an UNIQUE and immersive FEELING. Connect your finger to the trigger. PRESS and SHOOT! - HD Graphics with DESTRUCTIBLE ENVIRONMENTS, detailed scenes full of particles and grapeshot.. Everything interacts with you and your soldiers.  - Become a real veteran soldier in the ONLINE TOURNAMENTS MODE, put yourself in a frenetic and dynamic adventure with NON STOP ACTION against other assassins players. Don‚Äôt stop shooting with the best commando and sniper mission game. - Supply yourself with a HUGE REAL ARSENAL. You have never seen so realistic guns in shooter games: pistols, shotguns, rifles, snipers, grenades‚Ä¶ feel like a real frontline commando! - Face the battlefield from different perspectives. Alternate among your mercenaries in REAL-TIME, find the ultimate combination to win the war in the ultimate killing game. - Set up your ASSASSIN SOLDIER squad with their unique skills: hacker, sniper, demolition man... Unlock new EPIC CHARACTER like the bazooka-man or the gunslinger! Have you ever seen an inflatable dinosaur on the battlefield?  TETRACORP is occupying several areas over the planet suppressing the villages, taking over their resources, and controlling every single communication. A new resistance has born and it‚Äôs time to eradicate this menace. Set your brigade of mercenaries and start the journey to battle, prelude of the biggest war the Earth has ever seen. The discovery of a new material, the element 115, it can decide the fate of the mankind and it can not fall in the hands of Tetracorp. In Cover Fire you will be the hero who lead a squad of veterans through sieged cities, deserts and fields taken by guerrillas, and defeat all kind of enemies in the war game with the biggest graphic, greatest arsenal and the best gameplay on the store. The ultimate war experience. Intuitive controls designed to create an entirely immersive sensation. Take cover, aim, shoot and eliminate this hazard. Don‚Äôt let the terrorists own the world in the best military shooter game ever! As the leader of the rebellion, you will face the army of the enemy corp: elite soldiers, lethal special units, mechs with impenetrable shields, powerful tanks‚Ä¶ Take the control of the battlefield, deal with the conflict as a real war machine. Become the legend of this world war in the most addictive fps multiplayer.  - Challenging Story mode. Fight against Tetracorp and lead a mercenary riot on every mission. The best gameplay in the most engaging shooting game ever. - Feel the new experience unique in shooter games. Press the screen, pull the trigger and shoot!. Destroy and annihilate all the bad guys with your powerful weapons and your well-assembled team of heroes! - Upgrade the skills and abilities of every member of your band: make them faster, stronger, more lethal. Equip them with the best guns and gears. Level up your commando squad and lead them to victory. Limitless shooter action!   Will you be able to annihilate all the enemies in this bloody war? description: Are you crazy fans of teamwork style game and fire & ice style game?Fall in love adventure maze game and remember it from childhood ?This game made for you : Red boy and Blue girl in Forest Temple Maze 2Red boy (Fire boy) and his lover (blue girl - Water girl) who go with him is a puzzle adventure game for two players. It's an very addicting game to play with your kids, your lover and your friends.You've got two characters to control in this exciting puzzle game. Lead Redboy and bluegirl to their doors in each level of the forest temple maze and collecting red diamonds and blue diamonds along the way. Red boy (Fire boy) must avoid the water and blue girl (water girl ) must avoid the fire, and be careful, the black water kills them both. This game made for you : Red boy and Blue girl in Forest Temple Maze 2
Red boy (Fire boy) and his lover (blue girl - Water girl) who go with him is a puzzle adventure game for two players.
It's an very addicting game to play with your kids, your lover and your friends.
You've got two characters to control in this exciting puzzle game.
Lead Redboy and bluegirl to their doors in each level of the forest temple maze and collecting red diamonds and blue diamonds along the way.
Red boy (Fire boy) must avoid the water and blue girl (water girl ) must avoid the fire, and be careful, the black water kills them both.
Using your brain to control objects in game such as lever, pusher, mirror, black ball, light beam, elevator, wind machine, pulley system in order to open path that leads to the doors.
Game free and offline. You can play any where , don't need internet

comments: basically a very good game, but it would be really nice if a few more controls were added such as the ability to pre-call anything or prefold before it gets to your turn. I also would like the two hole cards to be a little bit more distinctive. Speaking for people with bad eyesight, it's sometimes a little hard to see the card on the left.

This game is great, would give it five stars. Most people play reasonably and don't go all in all the time. The leagues are neat and the play style is cool. The only reason for the low review is, several times I have tried to buy into a tournament 100k or 10k and had a connection issue and my money just disappears. Would love to get my few 100k back.

After league update was initiated the game no longer recognizes what state I'm playing from. All my trophies are from Montana, but now I'm grouped with California. Also stuck in Starter 2 league with 4.3 million in winnings and by far and away 1st place. I see other people have been able to advance leagues and are not having my problems. Enjoyable game, hope the bugs will be patched soon as I find myself playing other apps while I wait.

It's poker. What else do you want? I'm a little bummed you can't play full ring games but it helps me work on my short handed game. And yes there are other little things. What game didn't have that? Good program.

Game cheats.  16 bad beats in 30 min.  The game stopped matching me with other real players and put me up against bots that don't lose.  Won 40% of the tournaments i played and got within 1million of a fast track increase when the game decided my winning was over.  I couldn't win jack squat for 2 days. All a gimmick to get you buying chips.

I love the new Winter Wonderland Tournament. Won over 3 million in just 3 days. Moved me up to #1 in my league. Then I moved onto the next league. People who complain about this game; they give you free chips! Don't buy chips, morons.

description: Do you love My Pretend Home & Family? Do you love Pretend Hospital, Pretend Airport and Pretend Grocery Store? Then you will LOVE My Pretend Mall - Kids Shopping Center & Supermarket Games!My Pretend Mall - Kids Shopping center games lets you pretend play inside a gigantic mall full of delicious food and snacks like a donut and sushi bar! Grab donuts, drinks, coffee, and head over to the cool sushi bar with sushi moving around the table in a circle like Sushi Boat restaurants! Head inside the candy shop and dispense loads of candy to your heart's content! Chocolate candy, gummy treats, cotton candy machines and more!Head over the Movie Theater, and check out the costumes, accessories, toys, and theater seating! Make yourself comfortable and pretend play on stage!Head over to the fashion hallway, and try on various costumes and clothes! Hats, accessoreis and more are available in the dressing room!Once you're done eating, and trying on clothes, head over to the gym, and grab some of the free weights, boxing gloves, and start punching the bag! Do your gym routine before heading to more fun areas in the Mall!Get some more exercise by heading to the Skatepark, and trying the Skateboards and bikes out on the cool ramps! Go inside the mall arcade where you can play video games, prize claw machines, skee ball, and dance dance arcade games! Grab a drink from the vending machine to cool off!Go to the rooftop gardens and explore and touch the various plants, fruit trees and animals! Take a nice rest in this tranquil area of the mall!My Pretend Shopping Mall has SO much to explore, you will never want to leave! From food court to movie theater to skateparks, and arcades! TONS of stuff to do, and explore in another epic Pretend Series game for kids!
descriptionHTML:
Do you love My Pretend Home & Family? Do you love Pretend Hospital, Pretend Airport and Pretend Grocery Store? Then you will LOVE My Pretend Mall - Kids Shopping Center & Supermarket Games!

My Pretend Mall - Kids Shopping center games lets you pretend play inside a gigantic mall full of delicious food and snacks like a donut and sushi bar! Grab donuts, drinks, coffee, and head over to the cool sushi bar with sushi moving around the table in a circle like Sushi Boat restaurants!

Head inside the candy shop and dispense loads of candy to your heart's content! Chocolate candy, gummy treats, cotton candy machines and more!

Head over the Movie Theater, and check out the costumes, accessories, toys, and theater seating! Make yourself comfortable and pretend play on stage!

Head over to the fashion hallway, and try on various costumes and clothes! Hats, accessoreis and more are available in the dressing room!

Once you're done eating, and trying on clothes, head over to the gym, and grab some of the free weights, boxing gloves, and start punching the bag! Do your gym routine before heading to more fun areas in the Mall!

Get some more exercise by heading to the Skatepark, and trying the Skateboards and bikes out on the cool ramps!

Go inside the mall arcade where you can play video games, prize claw machines, skee ball, and dance dance arcade games! Grab a drink from the vending machine to cool off!

Go to the rooftop gardens and explore and touch the various plants, fruit trees and animals! Take a nice rest in this tranquil area of the mall!

My Pretend Shopping Mall has SO much to explore, you will never want to leave! From food court to movie theater to skateparks, and arcades! TONS of stuff to do, and explore in another epic Pretend Series game for kids!

comments: Fun Game! Something like Starcraft and something like Clash of Clans, but it stands as its own thing entirely. Why aren't more people playing this!? I've had much fun playing and it looks like the game is thoroughly enjoyable. Thank you for making this game. :)
So I'm guessing copyright laws don't apply in China.  Such a blatant rip off of Blizzard's Starcraft. And Starcraft is much, much better.

The game has strong Starcraft themes and is an interesting look at how you can execute a system for the phone instead of computer with a mouse. I do not like the amount of shop or cash purchase options they keep throwing in my face including making buying something with real money one of the quest missions.  The graphics are nice and it seems to have a interesting story otherwise, so it's at least worth looking at. If they reduce the amount of pay to win being thrown right up front I would be willing to raise this to four stars

The game is rigged. You won't be able to rank up until you invest more money to win. It's a pay to win game. Not worth the time and money. Mobile games in general suck. Just save up for a console game. Microtransactions ate rip offs.
Really regret paying for Monthly VIP, not worth playing this game
Not being able to pick species straight away is making it Meh for me.

comments: I'm a sports junkie so of course this game drew my attention. Wasn't sure about the gameplay at first, but I like this game enough to play everyday. I actually have some decent ideas for this game that could put it over the top. If the app developers actually read this review then you should contact me. I have ideas that would make this game have an even broader spectrum in the marketplace, reaching not only sports nuts like myself, but gamers in general.

I like the plays, plus you can put it on auto and watch it if you get tired. Just one problem. Your Dev people need to look into this: I thought if the spinner landed in the bright green, your play would go the yards it was supposed to. If it landed in the dark green, your play would gain a few more yards. Now the bad stuff. If the spinner landed in the bright red, your play and your opponent's play would fail and if it landed in the dark red, the ball was either fumbled or intercepted, depending upon the play. That's what happens to me, but not to my opponent. Many times when the spinner goes to the red, between the 40 yard line and the goal line, he will spin, and the spinner landed in the red. He will get a touchdown. His play was supposed to fail.

I love this game alot but it's getting annoying now. I had to restart bc I lost my other game but my team is about 80points good. I just lost to a team that has 40. I find that sad. My team is way better. Not the first time bc I've lost to a 40,46,50,63,75. Please make it harder for teams that are low beat a time higher then them. Make it more challenging for teams that are lower

I like the game overall but the clock management is really bad. Like 40 seconds for a play? At least add timeouts or make the plays not waste so much time. Also yall should add playoffs for the season, not jus win win win and win. It should be more competitive in the season mode and not just winning cause it gets boring. That's what I suggest but overall the game is good . Pls reply and make a huge update . :)
Are you kidding me. Blitz doesnt help against the run. It absolutly does. And you are seriously telling me that i cant make 10 passing plays in a row. I absolutly can in real life. So unrealistic.

Other than you can't see a lot of the plays it's a really good game. But one thing .you guys should put more indept into the game by letting us see more plays .instead of only the plays that counts. I myself want to see indept plays. But other than that. It a great game

comments: Very good! The graphics are reminiscent of scribblenauts, which is a great look, controls are simple yet very good. But, I do have two problems: One, the pricing of the sets are too much for what they are. 6.99? More like 4.99. The currency i can understand, maybe bump up the quantity of the 50.00 dollar currency pack, otherwise, the currency pricing is fair. The other one is that there are many framerate bugs! Please attempt to fix them! Besides my problems, the game gets a score, in my book, of a 4.0, great game!

It was a fantastic time eating, addictive, fun game;  The developer became greedy with too many ads.  Also, at the same time, it started using too many resources, frequently pausing for up to two seconds during gameplay, rendering it unplayable.  I really enjoyed this game. Nice, challenging physics and strategy through design and problem solving.

Only reason I've won't give 5 stars is that they use to give holidays special mission this year they've skipped it. Seen a few improvements other last year an half but nothing major. But all in all fun game build crafts and hope u make it.

Not only did it give actual cancer, but now I must clench my memory of this game but also purge every single person who has ever played this god forsaken game, including myself. Have a nice day.

descriptionHTML:

description: A truth: wolves come in all flavors. And they‚Äôre all noisy as howl.Combine different mutant wolf types to discover a barking gigantic variety of new wild dog species.Some like to turn into men by daytime, some like wearing clothes from their sheep prey, I mean, friends, and some are even among us as we speak!Gotta fetch them all!WOLVEN FEATURESüê∫Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our miseryüê∫Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the wolves.HOW TO PLAYüê∫Drag and drop similar wolves to create new mysterious creaturesüê∫Use wolf eggs (problem?) to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more moneyüê∫Alternatively, fiercely tap a wolf to make coins pop from their eggs (yes, eggs, you read right. Geez‚Ä¶)HIGHLIGHTSüê∫Different stages and many wolf species to discoverüê∫A mind-blowing story with howling twists!üê∫The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker gamesüê∫Doodle-like illustrationsüê∫Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!üê∫No wolves were harmed in the making of this game, only developersWhy are there lunar eclipses sometimes? Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionHTML:
A truth: wolves come in all flavors. And they’re all noisy as howl.

Combine different mutant wolf types to discover a barking gigantic variety of new wild dog species.

Some like to turn into men by daytime, some like wearing clothes from their sheep prey, I mean, friends, and some are even among us as we speak!

Gotta fetch them all!

WOLVEN FEATURES

🐺Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
🐺Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the wolves.

HOW TO PLAY

🐺Drag and drop similar wolves to create new mysterious creatures
🐺Use wolf eggs (problem?) to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
🐺Alternatively, fiercely tap a wolf to make coins pop from their eggs (yes, eggs, you read right. Geez…)

HIGHLIGHTS

🐺Different stages and many wolf species to discover
🐺A mind-blowing story with howling twists!
🐺The unexpected mix of alpaca-like evolution and incremental clicker games
🐺Doodle-like illustrations
🐺Open-ended gameplay: enjoy the freedom!
🐺No wolves were harmed in the making of this game, only developers

Why are there lunar eclipses sometimes?

Well, after stuffing the universe with mutant wolves, the answer is howling obvious, ain’t it?

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

comments: At first i didn't like it but as i kept messing around and playing i LOVED IT. The game is very very fun addictive and sometimes intense. Besides some lag problems the game is very fun. Plus the darkened areas are annoying when they are in the middle out the screen. Would be kind of cool if you added co-op with friends for more fun. Still VERY FUN ADDICTIVE GAME!!! üòÄüòÄüòÄüòÄüòÄ

Amazing game!! It may take a few games to understand how everything works but once you get the hang of it, its just awesome. However, sometimes its not so easy to see the territories because its too dark and there was once that the game was supposed to end but froze instead. Nonetheless those do not take away the 5 stars this game deserves

Unplayable. I started, had to go back to the menu to check how to defend, and then whenever I click "continue" an unskippable ad plays that just takes me back to the menu where the entire process repeats itself. I was really looking forward to this game (looked great, good reviews) but it just turned into a bug that just generates ad revenue. If this would get fixed i would play again and give it a higher rating, but until then, 2 stars.

Hard to get used to, once you understand it was enjoyable! But has no conclusion, you play a half hour game and win, just have your screen fix on a location and back out. Just tell me I won. And once the game is in progress, there is no was to tell the difference between team colors, country boundries, or what you need to or can accomplish. Overall good concept, just really missed on the execution. Try again, it was actually fun until it really wasn't, and you just want it to end, but it didn't even give you that.

This game is one of the best games on the App Store, if not THE best game ever to be on the App Store. The graphics are amazing.  The gameplay is very refined, I never got bored of making world peace via pacts and then nuking it all with superweapons. What can I say that yasn't yet been said? It's a nuclear war simulator, turning our worst fears into great joy.

Awesome strategy game that sort of tests your ability to pay attention to everything and soooooooo addictive. You also have balance between scientific and military power plus control your land as you grow. Two problems are at the end of my matches, when I'm the last superpower standing, the game sometimes crashes where I can't move around the globe and one of the objective is to occupy all of Africa but every time I do it doesn't unlock the objective.

So choose your steps carefully, it‚Äôs a small path between war and peace. FIRST STRIKE is a great strategy simulation featuring snappy gameplay and an intuitive interface that makes dropping the big one as easy as ABC. But be sure to take the right measures to guarantee your people‚Äôs safety. Pick one of the big nuclear players ‚Äì from known Superpowers to an upstart hellraiser like North Korea ‚Äì and plan your strategy wisely: Limited but clever options let you as the leader of your superpower steer your nation‚Äôs fate: Expand to other countries, build bombs or debuild in order to restructure your arsenal. Or use research to widen your options, such as: Ability to act quicker and build bigger bombs, better recon on your enemies actions, automated self-defense-sequences and many more.Whether you‚Äôre a bloodthirsty warmonger  or a tree-hugging hippie ‚Äì it‚Äôs time to put your cards on the table. descriptionHTML:
Millions of commanders are already playing First Strike all over the world.

====================

**** - "A thought provoking and fast-paced strategy game" - pocketgamer
**** - "A gorgeous game with a message, that doesn’t forget that it’s a game" - 148apps
****½ - "An awesome game suited for casual and professional nukers alike" - appszoom
**** - "For my money, there is no better-looking game on the App Store" - pockettactics
****½ - "One of the best releases of the year" - whatsoniphone

====================

Escalation is a downward spiral.

A nuclear armageddon is no one’s dream scenario. So choose your steps carefully, it’s a small path between war and peace. FIRST STRIKE is a great strategy simulation featuring snappy gameplay and an intuitive interface that makes dropping the big one as easy as ABC. But be sure to take the right measures to guarantee your people’s safety.

Pick one of the big nuclear players – from known Superpowers to an upstart hellraiser like North Korea – and plan your strategy wisely: Limited but clever options let you as the leader of your superpower steer your nation’s fate: Expand to other countries, build bombs or debuild in order to restructure your arsenal. Or use research to widen your options, such as: Ability to act quicker and build bigger bombs, better recon on your enemies actions, automated self-defense-sequences and many more.

Whether you’re a bloodthirsty warmonger or a tree-hugging hippie – it’s time to put your cards on the table. A quick and fun game with beautiful graphics, FIRST STRIKE shows you how little it takes to heat things up. With the tip of your finger you can control the destiny of the precious and vulnerable rock floating through space, the rock we call mothership Earth.

====================

*Winner "Best Mobile Game" - Indie Prize Amsterdam*
*Winner "Most Innovative Game" - Best App Ever Awards*
*Winner "Game of the Year" - BOSA Awards*
*Winner "Newcomer of the Year" - SwissICT Awards*

*Finalist "Best Upcoming Game" - International Mobile Game Awards*
*Finalist "Most Meaningful Play" - International Mobile Game Awards*
*Finalist "Best Hardcore Game" - Game Connection USA Awards*
*Finalist "Most Innovative Game" - Game Connection USA Awards*
*Finalist “Best Strategy Game” - Best App Ever Awards*
*Finalist "Best International Game" - Ludicious Game Festival*
*Finalist "Best Swiss Game" - SGDA Awards*

descriptionHTML:
Tricky Challenge 2 is a free puzzle game with a series of tricky brain teasers.

Each challenge is unique and the solution is out of box, you need to keep thinking and trying. And you will be tricked and think:”I have to say you are good at set ting a trap”. If you played Tricky Challenge 1, you will feel funny after you play the second one. If you didn’t, you will feel super amazing and change your thinking way when you play it.

Key Features:
Including 60 tricky&mind-blowing brain teasers.
- The playing way is abnormal but funny.
- The answer is obvious simple but usually wrong.
- Simple game genre and interesting special effect.
- Play by yourself or with your friends,both of them are Ok.
- No time limit-you can enjoy it on any time and place.
- Fun for all ages.

Tips:
This is a free puzzle game.Spend plenty of time to play free games and relax!

descriptionHTML:
Enjoy this fun-filled endless runner adventure based on the award-winning Paddington movie! Run through the busy streets of London to collect the delicious marmalade, beat challenges and unlock exciting new features in each action-packed level.

Along the way, you’ll collect lots of different costumes, handy boots and mystery boxes to help you conquer challenges. Kids and adults alike will enjoy the different mini-games that can be discovered throughout the game to help them collect even more marmalade and tokens!

TAKE A FUN RUN
• Easy controls that anyone can pick up and play
• Endless fun with lots of new challenges to discover
• Smooth gameplay for an immersive experience
• Quick play sessions for any time you fancy a game

THE LONDON RUSH
• Run through the bustling streets of London
• See London’s iconic landmarks and visit Paddington’s home at Windsor Gardens
• Dodge the city’s iconic black taxis and double-decker buses

COSTUMES, BOOTS AND MINI-GAMES
• Fancy a new costume? There are over 18 to collect, each with a splendid perk!
• Upgrade boots that help Paddington grab extra tokens, bounce over trouble and make almost any challenge easy
• Discover mini-games throughout each level to unlock the Jet Ski, Skateboard and other fun games!

So, ready for a run? Let’s get started!
